text: Mamie Elizabeth Till-Mobley (born Mamie Elizabeth Carthan; November 23, 1921 â€“ January 6, 2003) was an American educator and activist. She took part in the Civil Rights Movement. She was the mother of Emmett Till, who was killed at the age of 14 years old after allegedly offending a white woman. She insisted a open casket for her son for people to see what they had done to him. == References == Category:1921 births Category:2003 deaths
title: Mamie Till
